title: Restaurante de Las Pozas - Jardin Surrealista
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant of the Surrealist Garden of Edward James, it's inside the Las Pozas site, not to be confused with the Las Pozas restaurant that's in town. Vegans could get the lentil soup, bean soup, quinoa salad, and has vegetarian options like lasagna and aztec soup. A daily juice.
streetAddress: Camino Paseo Las Pozas s/n, Barrio La Conchita, 79902
